rtl.label: Right to Left direction
rtl.comment: If option is enabled then layout will be mirrored: "left is right and right is left". Should be enabled if you are using Middle eastern languages

floatingheader_menu.label: Menu on sticky header
floatingheader_menu.comment: Will be shown as button on mobile devices with the screen resolution up to 767px

floatingheader_search.label: Search on sticky header
floatingheader_search.comment: Will be shown inside navigation bar on devices with screen resolution up to 767px

header_bg_option.label: Background For header:
header_bg_option.comment: If "Part of 1st banner" is set then the 1st banner will be underneath the header. Colors won't be changed for the header in this case. This option available only for home page. On sub-pages skin color will be used.

logo_status.label: Logo status
logo_status.comment: Disable it to use default logo

small_logo_status.label: Small Logo status
small_logo_status.comment: Will be used in sticky header.

small_logo_retina.label: Upload your retina ready small logo

displayas.label: Top links type
displayas.comment: If default is set, then links will be shown like in default magento. If custom - then they will be shown as dropdown list (like on demo)

mycart.label: Top Cart Options
mycart.comment: Warning! At least one option should be active, owtherwise all top cart elements will be shown

cartonhover.label: Open cart on hover
cartonhover.comment: Hover cart will work only on desktop. Default "On click" top cart will work on mobile devices.

newsletterbg_retina.label: Upload your newsletter background for retina display

bgoption.label: Background Option
bgoption.comment: Set the position for background image.

grid.label: Number of columns in grid view

addtocart.label: Button "Add to cart"
addtocart.comment: Enable or disable Button "Add to cart"

customAspectRatio.label: Aspect Ratio
customAspectRatio.comment:
As Is means all of your images will be displayed as is without any transformation. The width is set in .phtml templates, the height is calculated automatically
Keep The Same Height the best option if your images have different proportions, in that case all of them will have the same height but with keeping correct aspect ratio (spaces will be added if required)
Width x Height - there are a few predefined aspect ratios you can choose from the list

reallyCustomAspectRatio.label: Set your own value of height ratio to width...
reallyCustomAspectRatio.comment: To calculate this value you need to div the height of your image to the width. Cannot be empty

rollover_status.label: Status
rollover_status.comment: To use hover effect for a product set a label for needed image as "hover".

rollover_type.label: Effect Type
rollover_type.comment: Choose effect for appearing hover images

labelonlyxleft.label: Label "Only X left
labelonlyxleft.comment: Will be shown instead of "On sale" label

status.label: Status
status.comment: Enable or Disable Ajax Login in Header

onlyhome.label: Show only on the homepage
onlyhome.comment: If set yes, popup will be shown only on home page.

showcateogry.label: Hide on the category
showcateogry.comment: If set yes, popup will be hidden on category.

cookielifetime.label: Popup expires end
cookielifetime.comment: Set period in days after which popup will be shown again if customer has already subscribed or chosen option "Don't show this popup again". Set from 1 to infinite.

block.label: Details block status
block.comment: Will show block with detailed information over the Google map

blockwidth.label: Details Block Width
blockwidth.comment: Please specify block width in pixels

blockheight.label: Details Block Height
blockheight.comment: Please specify block height in pixels

blockposition.label: Details Block Position
blockposition.comment: Please set one of four available details block position over the Gmap

theme.label: Theme
theme.comment: Choose a theme where skin.css will be placed. If chosen "bizarre/default" - default file will be replaced!

font_main.label: Font replacement
font_main.comment: If choose disable option will be used standard font "Arial"

font.label: Font replacement
font.comment: If choose disable option will be used standard font "Arial"

patern_title.label: Background Paterns (Will work only on "boxed" layout)

base_override.label: Override Base Colors
base_override.comment: Enable it to get ability override base colors using options below. No one color except "base" ones won't be generated until this options is set to "Disable"

sitebg.comment: Click inside to change a color

prevnext.label: Prev and Next product buttons
prevnext.comment: Allows you to move between products within a category just in one click

product_sku.label: Product SKU
product_sku.comment: Will be displayed under product title

collateral_related.label: Related products block
collateral_related.comment: Slider option will work if product has 5+ related products

relatedviewmode.label: Related block view mode
relatedviewmode.comment: Set variant to show more detailed product image

moreviews.label: More views block
moreviews.comment: Slider option will work if product has 4+ images

moreviews_hover.label: More views hover
moreviews_hover.comment: If this options is enabled, then product images will be changed on hover.

collateral_position.label: Collateral block position
collateral_position.comment: On some of layouts of product page it isn't recommended to put collateral into details block due to limited space

pagelayout.label: Product Page layout
pagelayout.comment: Allows to choose layout for product page

brandpos.label: Brand Image Position
brandpos.comment: Choose where your brand image will be shown

brandtarget.label: Link target blank
brandtarget.comment: Choose "Yes" if you want open links in a new tab

brandsearch.label: Link to brand search
brandsearch.comment: Image will refer to search products by brand

brandformat.label: Brand Image Format
brandformat.comment: All of your images must have the same format

productbrand.label: Product Brand Image
productbrand.comment: Allows to display brand image on product pages

product_custom.label: Under product description
product_custom.comment: Comma separated list of static block identifiers. These static blocks will be displayed one below the other

product_tabs.label: Products Tabs
product_tabs.comment: Comma separated list of static block identifiers.

product_related_content.label: "Related" static block
product_related_content.comment: Comma separated list of static block identifiers. Will replace related products block ot its position

status.label: Status
status.comment: Adds rich data-markup to your product pages so search engines will show richer item preview with information about price, reviews and breadcrumbs

breadcrumbs.label: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.comment: Will show paths to your product pages on search pages of search engines

product_ratings.label: Reviews and Ratings
product_ratings.comment: Will show reviews and ratings on search pages of search engines

product_price.label: Price
product_price.comment: Will show price on search pages of search engines

status.label: Status
status.comment: Enable this block to display newsletter in sidebar.

href.label: Facebook Page URL
href.comment: The URL of the Facebook Page to like

height.label: Height
height.comment: The pixel height of the plugin

faces.label: Show Friends' Faces
faces.comment: Show profile photos when friends like this

header.label: Show Header
header.comment: Show the "Find Us on Facebook" header on the plugin

stream.label: Show Posts
stream.comment: Show posts from the Page's timeline

border.label: Show Border
border.comment: Show a border around the plugin
